mapper.select: SELECT WorkType from Curriculum group by WorkType
select Curriculum_no, CurriName from Curriculum where WorkType=#{workType}
select CurriName, PeriodFr, PeriodTo from Curriculum where Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no};

SELECT c.workType, c.curriculum_no, c.package_no, c.curriName, c.periodFr, c.periodTo, c.startDay, c.time, c.num, c.money, c.support, c.inquiry, c.state, c.curriNickname, c.curriculumCate_no, p.packageName, g.gisuName FROM Curriculum as c JOIN Package as p ON c.package_no = p.package_no JOIN Gisu as g ON c.curriculum_no = g.curriculum_no WHERE c.curriculum_no = #{curriculum_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Curriculum (curriculumCate_no, workType, curriName, curriNickname, periodFr, periodTo, startDay, time, num, money, support, inquiry, state, package_no) VALUES( (SELECT curriculumCate_no FROM CurriculumCate WHERE curriculumCate_no = #{curriculumCate_no}), #{workType}, #{curriName}, #{curriNickname}, #{periodFr}, #{periodTo}, #{startDay}, #{time}, #{num}, #{money}, #{support}, #{inquiry}, #{state}, (SELECT package_no from Package WHERE package_no = #{package_no}) );
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.nameHan, u.birthDate, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN '여자' ELSE '남자' END gender, a.testResult, c.curriname FROM Users as u, ApplyInfo as a, Curriculum as c WHERE u.User_no = a.User_no and c.curriculum_no = 1 and a.curriculum_no = 1
SELECT workType, curriculum_no, package_no, curriculumCate_no, workType, curriName, periodFr, periodTo, startDay, time, num, money, support, inquiry, state, curriNickname FROM Curriculum;
SELECT curriculumCate_no, cateName, groupCode, parentCode, depth FROM CurriculumCate;
